title: Premium UI/UX visual redesign for Oishi Heal Touch healthcare website

requirements.text: Apply premium visual styling across all pages: add soft glassmorphism effects to key sections, use smooth gradient overlays using existing brand colors (medical blue/teal), add depth with soft shadows (box-shadow with blur 20-40px, not harsh), increase white space for luxury feel, improve section separation with subtle background variations, and add elegant border radius (12px-20px to cards and containers)

quotes: Add soft glassmorphism or subtle layered backgrounds
Use smooth gradient overlays using existing brand colors
Add depth with soft shadows (not harsh)
Increase white space for luxury feel

acceptanceCriteria: All page sections have increased padding and margin for breathing room
Cards and containers use 12px-20px border radius
Soft shadows are applied with blur values between 20-40px
Gradient overlays use only existing brand colors from the OKLCH color palette
Glassmorphism effects (backdrop-blur) are applied to hero sections and featured cards

requirements.text: Upgrade typography system: use Inter or Poppins-style bold geometric sans-serif for headings, clean minimal sans-serif for body text, increase hero heading size significantly, use softer subtext colors (reduce opacity or use muted variants), improve line-height for readability, and add slight letter spacing (0.02em-0.05em) for premium feel

quotes: Use modern premium font pairing: Heading: Bold geometric sans-serif (like Inter / Poppins style)
Add slight letter spacing for premium feel

acceptanceCriteria: Hero headings are at least 25% larger than current size
All headings use bold weight (700 or higher) with geometric sans-serif font
Body text has line-height of 1.6 or higher
Subtext colors use muted variants or reduced opacity
Headings have letter-spacing between 0.02em and 0.05em

requirements.text: Enhance hero section on HomePage: add subtle background gradient blur effect, add soft floating shapes (minimal, elegant, using CSS), implement smooth fade-in animation on page load, upgrade CTA buttons to rounded pill style with soft gradient background using brand colors, and add subtle hover animation (scale 1.05 with glow effect)

quotes: Add soft floating shapes (very minimal, elegant)
Make CTA button more premium: Rounded pill style, Soft gradient background, Subtle hover animation (scale 1.05 + glow)

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section background has gradient with blur effect applied
2-3 floating decorative shapes are positioned using CSS (absolute/fixed) with subtle animation
Hero content fades in smoothly on page load (0.6-1s duration)
CTA buttons use rounded pill style (border-radius 9999px or equivalent)
CTA buttons have gradient background from brand color palette
CTA buttons scale to 1.05 and show glow effect on hover

requirements.text: Enhance service cards across all pages: maintain existing grid layout but add hover lift effect (translateY -8px to -12px), add soft shadow depth that increases on hover, implement animated icon hover with micro movement (scale or rotate), add subtle gradient border glow on hover, add smooth transition animation (0.3s ease-in-out), and style cards to feel like premium SaaS design

quotes: Keep same grid layout but: Add hover lift effect, Add soft shadow depth, Add animated icon hover (micro movement), Add subtle gradient border glow on hover, Add smooth transition animation (0.3s ease-in-out)
Make cards feel like premium SaaS design

acceptanceCriteria: Service cards lift up 8-12px on hover using translateY
Card shadow increases in size and intensity on hover
Icons within cards scale or rotate slightly on card hover
Cards show gradient border glow on hover using brand colors
All card transitions use 0.3s ease-in-out timing
Grid layout structure remains unchanged

requirements.text: Redesign all primary action buttons (Book Appointment, Call Now, View Doctors) across all pages: convert to rounded pill style, add soft shadow, apply gradient background using brand colors, implement hover glow effect, and add subtle click animation (scale down slightly on active state)

quotes: For: Book Appointment, Call Now, View Doctors. Upgrade to: Rounded pill style, Soft shadow, Gradient background using brand colors, Hover glow effect, Subtle click animation

acceptanceCriteria: All Book Appointment buttons use pill style with full rounded corners
All Call Now buttons use pill style with full rounded corners
All View Doctors buttons use pill style with full rounded corners
Buttons have soft drop shadow applied
Button backgrounds use gradient from brand color palette
Buttons show glow effect on hover (box-shadow with color)
Buttons scale down slightly (0.95-0.98) on active/click state

requirements.text: Upgrade mobile experience: improve spacing between elements with increased padding and margins, make all buttons larger and touch-friendly (minimum 48px height), add sticky bottom CTA with glassmorphism effect that remains visible during scroll, and implement smooth scroll reveal animations for content sections

quotes: Since most traffic is mobile: Improve spacing between elements, Larger touch-friendly buttons, Sticky bottom CTA with glass effect, Smooth scroll animations

acceptanceCriteria: Mobile spacing increased by at least 25% between sections
All interactive buttons have minimum 48px height on mobile viewports
Sticky bottom CTA bar is implemented with backdrop-blur glassmorphism
Sticky CTA remains fixed at bottom during scroll on mobile
Content sections animate in smoothly as user scrolls down

requirements.text: Implement elegant micro-interactions throughout the site: add smooth scroll reveal animations for sections appearing as user scrolls, add hover transitions to interactive elements, implement button ripple or glow effect on interaction, add subtle icon animations (rotate, scale, or bounce on hover), and ensure all animations are elegant and performant without being flashy

quotes: Add: Smooth scroll reveal animations, Hover transitions, Button ripple or glow effect, Subtle icon animation
Keep animations elegant and not flashy

acceptanceCriteria: Sections fade in or slide up as they enter viewport during scroll
All interactive elements (links, cards, buttons) have smooth hover transitions
Buttons show ripple or expanding glow effect when clicked
Icons show subtle animation on hover (scale, rotate, or bounce)
All animations use CSS transitions or keyframes (no heavy libraries)
Animation durations are between 0.2s and 0.6s for subtlety

constraints: Do not change the layout structure or section arrangement
Do not modify the existing brand color palette (medical blue/teal from OKLCH system)
Do not rearrange content sections or change their order
Do not add or generate AI photos or images
Do not use heavy animation libraries - keep animations lightweight with CSS
Keep code optimized for performance and speed
nonGoals: Adding new content sections or pages
Changing brand colors or introducing new color schemes
Adding external image assets or AI-generated photos
Changing the order or hierarchy of page sections
